T02D2802:161b-0: @161b * // rgyal ba nyi ma dang zla ba'i phyag mtshan can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2802:161b-1: dbang po rtul po nyid dang gang //
T02D2802:161b-3: gzhan dag bsod nams nor 'dod pa //
T02D2802:161b-4: de ni nyi zla'i mtshan can bsgrub //
T02D2802:161b-5: sprin tshogs rdul dang khug rna du ba dang //
T02D2802:161b-6: rlangs bral dri med beed'urya bcag 'dra'i //
T02D2802:161b-7: mkha' la dpal bzang nyi zla 'char bar byed //
T02D2802:161b-8: de tshe dang ldan smra ba bcad nags 'jug / drang srong bu dang lhan cig nags bzang du //
T02D2802:161b-9: srid pa'i sdug bsngal skyon ni dran byas la //
T02D2802:161b-10: bdud 'dul thub pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya che //
T02D2802:161b-11: mngon sum bcas te padma'i mig gnyis bskyod //
T02D2802:161b-12: de'i 'og tu mchod pa thams cad sta gon byas nas /
T02D2802:161b-13: bdug pa dri zhim po thams cad kyis bdug cing /
T02D2802:161b-14: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig / stobs
T02D2802:161b-15: bcu'i 'od zer chen pos 'gro ba gsum gyi mun
T02D2802:161b-16: pa sel ba dus tshad med par brtson pa'i chos
T02D2802:161b-17: kyi rgyal po nyi ma dang zla ba'i mtshan ma
T02D2802:161b-18: can de ring rgyal bar gyur cig / bdag cag
T02D2802:161b-19: la sogs pa'i dbang po rtul po dang /
T02D2802:162a-0: bsod nams gnyer ba rnams kyi phrin las thogs pa @162a * //
T02D2802:162a-1: mi mnga' bar mdzod cig / ces lan gnyis lan gsum ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do //
T02D2802:162a-2: nyi ma zla ba las kun la sngags bdun 'don rnam las brjod pa gang yin dang //
T02D2802:162a-3: thugs rje'i lhas bstan drang srong aa bhis shar du kha bltas chags bral rnyed tshe mngon bstod gang //
T02D2802:162a-4: de bzhin gang gzhan glang po skyong dang gter bdag gser srung 'od ma'i tshal du sngon byung dbyangs //
T02D2802:162a-5: de dag ma lus mgrin bzang rnams bsdebs mgrin gcig mchod bcas dang ba drag pos dngos grub stsol //
T02D2802:162a-6: de rjes rta bdun chu yi snying po 'od kyi dra ba can //
T02D2802:162a-7: snying brtses thugs brtul glo bur lhag ge byon pas gdong bsal gyur //
T02D2802:162a-8: de tshe ring par ma 'khrugs mchod bya gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2802:162a-9: dkyil 'khor gnyis dbus pad phyag nyi zla'i rgyan can 'bar ba'o //
T02D2802:162a-10: 'khor lo dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog can
T02D2802:162a-11: brtson pa'i cha byad gti mug dang chags pa dang
T02D2802:162a-12: / sdig pa gsum sel ba dang /
T02D2802:162a-13: sbyang ba'i phyir bsreg pa dang /
T02D2802:162a-14: bsil ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2802:162a-15: rgyun gyi mthar dran pa'i rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2802:162a-16: sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa zhes pa gnyis ci rigs su dran par bya'o //
T02D2802:162a-17: aom a'a:hr'i:badzra s'urya tsandra k'adza siddha sa ma ya sa
T02D2802:162a-18: ma ya smar smar aa nu smri ti ka ra
